Header.headerText: Clean code. Sharp decisions. Steady hand.
Header.title: Arbuz Tanya

Hero.title: Tanya Arbuz
Hero.description: I build scalable and modular systems with a keen focus on architecture, clean code, and iterative delivery. I take full ownership of challenges to deliver results, continuously seeking ways to enhance product and engineering processes, and transforming complex problems into robust, effective solutions.
Hero.descriptionMobile: I build scalable and modular systems with a keen focus on architecture, clean code, and iterative delivery.

AboutMe.leftSubtitle: A warrior doesn't boast — he simply knows what he's capable of.
AboutMe.description1: <highlight>Full-stack developer</highlight> with <highlight>4+ years of experience</highlight>, specializing in <secondary>web applications and Telegram bots</secondary>. I am proficient across the full stack, building <highlight>flexible and scalable solutions</highlight>.
AboutMe.description2: I am committed to <secondary>continuous learning</secondary>, value <secondary>team collaboration</secondary>, and am driven to find solutions that deliver <highlight>value to both the business and the team</highlight>.

TechnicalSkills.leftSubtitle: Tools in the hands of a master become an extension of his will.

Experience.leftSubtitle: Every line of code bears the mark of battle. Every project — a new victory.

contract.description: Architected and developed a headless CMS from scratch using Payload v3. Implemented custom collections, fields, and access controls, and integrated the CMS with a large-scale Next.js application to enable full-cycle dynamic content management.
contract.resultDescription: Delivered a scalable decoupled architecture; provided the client with a user-friendly solution for independent content management, significantly reducing content update times.

Education.leftSubtitle: The path isn’t defined by diplomas. Anything that makes you stronger is part of the journey.
Education.educ: Russian University of Cooperation | Accounting and Finance | 2003–2007

path.second: 2012-Present: From Hobby Projects to Professional Systems
path.third: Following industry leaders, documentation, and best practices.

Additional.leftSubtitle: Every project — like a battle. I enter it to win, not just to participate.
Additional.intro: This site is more than a resume; it's a full-stack open-source project showcasing my approach to software development.

projectFeatures.item1: An interactive resume with <highlight>real-time visitor analytics</highlight>.
projectFeatures.item2: Optimized architecture: <highlight>Next.js, Prisma + MariaDB, and caching</highlight>.
projectFeatures.item3: Professional practices: <highlight>type safety, lazy loading, and middleware</highlight>.
projectFeatures.item5: Performance (Lighthouse): <highlight>95+ on all Core Web Vitals</highlight>.
